name: Super Hair Super Cheats Addition
description:
Classic Super Hair side-scrolling shoot-em-up is now super easier with extra lives and no more starting at the very beginning when you run out of life and die!  For the casual gamers that just want to have a bit of fun and without all difficulty  :D

Play Games on your Pc using a free emulator like Fuse, Spin, Spectaculator and many others and it will also play on Real Hardware of course :D

Shoot like crazy, avoid baddies and save the world , Easy !!
